meta.comment: The following prediction should be relatively EASY (getting the differences-of-differences interaction in the right direction) #Prediction [(6;%what_no-gap%)-(6;%that_no-gap%)] + [(7;%that_gap%)-(7;%what_gap%)]>0  The following prediction should be relatively HARD (getting the direction of the that vs. what contrast right in both the gap and no-gap conditions)
meta.author: Ethan Wilcox
